title: Hard task for Alice
problem_statement:
Hard task for Alice

Problem Description

Bob gives Alice a task to do. The task was to build a string S of length N. Starting with an empty string, C, she can perform two operations:

  • Add a character at the end of C for A rupees
  • Copy any substring of C, and then add it to end of C for B rupees

Alice was happy to perform this task. Then, Bob challenged Alice to tell the minimum amount of money needed to build S.

The input consists of two lines:

  • The first line contains 3 space separated integers N, A and B respectively.
  • The second line contains string S which Bob wishes to build.

The output should be the minimum cost to build S.

Examples

Example 1:

Input:
9 8 9
bacbacab
Output: 42

Constraints

  • 1 <= N <= 104
  • 1 <= A, B <= 10000

title: PK's World Tour
problem_statement:
PK's World Tour

Problem Description

PK: Aamir Khan sets out for a world tour to N countries. He has planned out an itinerary for the same. He strictly follows the itinerary and visits countries in the same order as per the input. There are 3 modes of transport - Plane, Ship and Helicopter.

He never prefers to travel by the same mode of transport consecutively as its too boring and monotonous. But the cost C varies for each journey depending on the places and mode of transport.

Minimize the Total World Tour Travel Cost satisfying given condition.

Input:

The first line has N - Number of Countries.

The next N lines contain 3 numbers separated by space that represents the cost for the 3 modes of transport - Plane, Ship and Helicopter.

Output:

Print the Minimum Total world tour travel cost.

Constraints

  • 1 <= N <= 25
  • 1 <= cost of travel <= 1000

Examples

Example 1:

Input:
3
14 15 16
14 15 16
14 15 16
Output: 43

Example 2:

Input:
2
14 15 16
11 12 13
Output: 26
